entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with freezing rain beginning early this morning then changing to freezing rain this morning then changing to rain showers this afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Flurries beginning late this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
